nodes.id: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

zh-cn: 香港民主派初选大搜捕
串谋颠覆国家政权罪案
2021年香港立法会议员民主派初选案
串谋颠覆国家政权罪密谋案件
en: Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrests

description.zh-cn: 指控香港民主派初选参与者违反《香港国家安全法》、涉嫌“串谋颠覆国家政权”的案件。事件始于2021年1月警方的大规模拘捕行动，最终导致47人被起诉，45人被定罪。
description.en: A case in which participants of the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries were accused of violating the Hong Kong National Security Law and suspected of 'conspiracy to commit subversion'. The event began with a large-scale police arrest operation in January 2021, leading to the prosecution of 47 individuals and the conviction of 45.

nodes.id: 2020年香港立法会选举民主派初选

zh-cn: 2020年香港立法会选举民主派初选

description.zh-cn: 香港民主派为决定其在2020年香港立法会选举中的候选人而举行的一次初选，旨在争取超过35个立法会议席。
description.en: A primary election held by the Hong Kong pro-democracy camp to decide its candidates for the 2020 Hong Kong Legislative Council election, with the goal of winning over 35 seats.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法
en: Law of the People's Republic of China on Safeguarding National Security in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会为香港制定的国家安全法律，于2020年6月30日生效。该法案是香港民主派初选大搜捕的主要法律依据。
description.en: A national security law for Hong Kong enacted by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, which came into effect on June 30, 2020. This law was the primary legal basis for the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrests.

description.zh-cn: 由戴耀廷提出的政治方针，计划在民主派取得立法会多数席位后，通过否决政府财政预算案等方式，迫使政府回应政治诉求，被控方指为颠覆国家政权的计划。
description.en: A political strategy proposed by Benny Tai, which planned to use measures such as vetoing the government's budget after the pro-democracy camp obtained a majority in the Legislative Council to compel the government to respond to political demands. The prosecution alleged it was a plan to subvert state power.

nodes.id: 香港警务处国家安全处

zh-cn: 香港警务处国家安全处
en: National Security Department of the Hong Kong Police Force

description.zh-cn: 香港警务处下属负责执行《香港国安法》的部门，主导了对民主派初选参与者的大规模拘捕行动。
description.en: The department within the Hong Kong Police Force responsible for enforcing the National Security Law, which led the mass arrest operation against participants of the pro-democracy primaries.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府的法律部门，负责对香港民主派初选案中的47名被告提出“串谋颠覆国家政权罪”的检控。
description.en: The legal department of the Hong Kong SAR Government, responsible for prosecuting the 47 defendants in the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries case for 'conspiracy to commit subversion'.

description.zh-cn: 负责审理香港民主派初选案的法院。案件由三名国安法指定法官审理，不设陪审团。
description.en: The court responsible for hearing the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries case. The case was heard by three designated National Security Law judges without a jury.

description.zh-cn: 香港大学法律学院前副教授，2020年香港立法会选举民主派初选及“揽炒十步曲”的主要倡议者。在香港47人案中被裁定为“首要分子”，判处10年监禁。
description.en: A former associate professor of law at the University of Hong Kong and a key proponent of the 2020 Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries and the 'Ten steps to mutual destruction' plan. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he was classified as a 'principal offender' and sentenced to 10 years in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前香港立法会议员，民主派初选的组织者之一。在香港47人案中认罪并担任控方证人，被裁定为“首要分子”，判处6年9个月监禁。
description.en: Former member of the Hong Kong Legislative Council and one of the organizers of the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded guilty, served as a prosecution witness, was classified as a 'principal offender', and was sentenced to 6 years and 9 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前东区区议会副主席，民主动力召集人。在香港47人案中认罪并担任控方证人，被裁定为“首要分子”，判处7年监禁。
description.en: Former Vice-Chairman of the Eastern District Council and convenor of Power for Democracy. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded guilty, served as a prosecution witness, was classified as a 'principal offender', and was sentenced to 7 years in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前西贡区议会主席，民主动力副召集人。在香港47人案中认罪并担任控方证人，被裁定为“首要分子”，判处6年1个月监禁。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Sai Kung District Council and deputy convenor of Power for Democracy. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded guilty, served as a prosecution witness, was classified as a 'principal offender', and was sentenced to 6 years and 1 month in prison.

description.zh-cn: 民主动力司库，美籍人权律师。在香港民主派初选大搜捕中被捕，但未被起诉。
description.en: Treasurer of Power for Democracy and an American human rights lawyer. He was arrested during the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrests but was not prosecuted.

description.zh-cn: “三投三不投”运动发起人。在香港47人案中不认罪，经审讯后被裁定罪名成立，判处7年6个月监禁。
description.en: Initiator of the 'Three投Three不投' movement. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded not guilty, was convicted after trial, and sentenced to 7 years and 6 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前南区区议会议员，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中认罪，被判处4年3个月监禁。
description.en: Former Southern District Councillor and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, she pleaded guilty and was sentenced to 4 years and 3 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前中西区区议会议员，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中认罪，被判处4年11个月监禁。
description.en: Former Central and Western District Councillor and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded guilty and was sentenced to 4 years and 11 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前东区区议会议员，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中不认罪，经审讯后被裁定罪名成立，判处6年6个月监禁。
description.en: Former Eastern District Councillor and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded not guilty, was convicted after trial, and sentenced to 6 years and 6 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前东区区议会议员，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中认罪，被判处4年2个月监禁。
description.en: Former Eastern District Councillor and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded guilty and was sentenced to 4 years and 2 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前湾仔区议会主席，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中不认罪，经审讯后被裁定罪名成立，判处6年6个月监禁。
description.en: Former Wan Chai District Council Chairwoman and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, she pleaded not guilty, was convicted after trial, and sentenced to 6 years and 6 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前南区区议会议员，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中不认罪，经审讯后被裁定罪名成立，判处6年6个月监禁。
description.en: Former Southern District Councillor and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded not guilty, was convicted after trial, and sentenced to 6 years and 6 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前沙田区议会议员，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中认罪，被判处4年3个月监禁。
description.en: Former Sha Tin District Councillor and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded guilty and was sentenced to 4 years and 3 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前香港立法会议员，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中认罪，被判处4年2个月监禁。
description.en: Former member of the Hong Kong Legislative Council and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, she pleaded guilty and was sentenced to 4 years and 2 months in prison.

description.en: Former Sham Shui Po District Councillor and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded not guilty, was convicted after trial, and sentenced to 6 years and 7 months in prison.

description.en: Convenor of Peninsula Connection and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded guilty and was sentenced to 4 years and 5 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 前深水埗区议会议员，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中不认罪，经审讯后被裁定罪名不成立。
description.en: Former Sham Shui Po District Councillor and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded not guilty and was acquitted after trial.

description.zh-cn: 前香港立法会议员，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中不认罪，经审讯后被裁定罪名成立，判处6年6个月监禁。
description.en: Former member of the Hong Kong Legislative Council and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, she pleaded not guilty, was convicted after trial, and sentenced to 6 years and 6 months in prison.

description.en: Former Wong Tai Sin District Councillor and Chairman of ADPL, and a candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded not guilty, was convicted after trial, and sentenced to 6 years and 7 months in prison.

description.en: Initiator of the 'Resistance' movement and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded not guilty, was convicted after trial, and sentenced to 7 years and 9 months in prison.

description.en: Former member of the Hong Kong Legislative Council and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. He was arrested during the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrests but was not prosecuted.

description.zh-cn: 前东区区议会议员，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中不认罪，经审讯后被裁定罪名不成立，是首名正式结案的被告。
description.en: Former Eastern District Councillor and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, he pleaded not guilty, was acquitted after trial, and was the first defendant whose case was formally concluded.

description.zh-cn: 前医管局员工阵线主席，民主派初选参选人。在香港47人案中不认罪，经审讯后被裁定罪名成立，判处6年9个月监禁。
description.en: Former Chairwoman of the Hospital Authority Employees Alliance and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. In the Hong Kong 47 case, she pleaded not guilty, was convicted after trial, and sentenced to 6 years and 9 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 香港专职医疗人员及护士协会干事，民主派初选参选人。在香港民主派初选大搜捕中被捕，但未被起诉。
description.en: Officer of the Hong Kong Allied Health Professionals and Nurses Association and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. He was arrested during the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrests but was not prosecuted.

description.zh-cn: 前香港立法会议员，民主派初选参选人。在香港民主派初选大搜捕中被捕，但未被起诉。
description.en: Former member of the Hong Kong Legislative Council and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. He was arrested during the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrests but was not prosecuted.

description.zh-cn: 仁安医院护士学校校长，民主派初选参选人。在香港民主派初选大搜捕中被捕，但未被起诉。
description.en: Principal of the School of Nursing at Union Hospital and candidate in the pro-democracy primaries. He was arrested during the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrests but was not prosecuted.

description.zh-cn: 时任香港保安局局长，现任香港特别行政区行政长官。他形容民主派初选为“歹毒的计划”，并表示警方的拘捕行动是必要和必需的。
description.en: Then-Secretary for Security of Hong Kong, current Chief Executive of the HKSAR. He described the pro-democracy primaries as a 'vicious plot' and stated that the police's arrest operation was necessary and essential.

description.zh-cn: 香港警务处国家安全处高级警司，负责向公众解释拘捕行动，指控初选计划旨在瘫痪政府。
description.en: Senior Superintendent of the National Security Department of the Hong Kong Police Force, responsible for explaining the arrest operation to the public, alleging the primary election plan aimed to paralyze the government.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主派政党，多名成员参与了民主派初选并被起诉，其中四名成员（杨岳桥、谭文豪、郭家麒、李予信）在审讯期间宣布退党。
description.en: A pro-democracy political party in Hong Kong. Several members participated in the pro-democracy primaries and were prosecuted. Four members (Alvin Yeung, Jeremy Tam, Kwok Ka-ki, Lee Yue-shun) announced their withdrawal from the party during the trial.

description.zh-cn: 协调民主派参与选举的组织，协助举办了2020年民主派初选。其召集人赵家贤及副召集人钟锦麟在案件中被起诉。
description.en: An organization that coordinated pro-democracy participation in elections and helped organize the 2020 pro-democracy primaries. Its convenor Andrew Chiu and deputy convenor Chung Kam-lun were prosecuted in the case.

en: Hong Kong Public Opinion Research Institute

description.zh-cn: 负责民主派初选投票操作的民意调查机构。
description.en: An opinion polling organization responsible for the voting operations of the pro-democracy primaries.

description.zh-cn: 香港民意研究所负责人。在民主派初选大搜捕中被警方带走协助调查。
description.en: Head of the Hong Kong Public Opinion Research Institute. He was taken by the police to assist in the investigation during the pro-democracy primaries mass arrests.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责外交事务的政府部门，多次就香港民主派初选案表态，支持香港警方的行动，并反对外国干涉。
description.en: The government department responsible for foreign affairs of the People's Republic of China. It has repeatedly commented on the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries case, supporting the actions of the Hong Kong police and opposing foreign interference.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国国务卿，对香港民主派初选大搜捕表示愤慨，并促请当局释放被捕人士。
description.en: Then-U.S. Secretary of State, who expressed outrage at the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrests and urged the authorities to release the arrested individuals.

description.zh-cn: 时任英国外交大臣，谴责香港民主派初选大搜捕行动，认为此举旨在打压异见。
description.en: Then-UK Foreign Secretary, who condemned the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrest operation, stating it was intended to suppress dissent.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国总统，谴责香港民主派初选大搜捕，指出北京当局彻底毁弃了“五十年不变”的承诺。
description.en: Then-President of the Republic of China, who condemned the Hong Kong pro-democracy primaries mass arrests, stating that the Beijing authorities had completely abandoned the promise of 'fifty years unchanged'.

relationships.source: 2020年香港立法会选举民主派初选
relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 香港警方以筹办或参与2020年民主派初选为由，发动大规模拘捕行动，引发了香港47人案。
description.en: The Hong Kong police launched a large-scale arrest operation on the grounds of organizing or participating in the 2020 pro-democracy primaries, which triggered the Hong Kong 47 case.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法
relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 香港警方依据《香港国安法》中的“颠覆国家政权罪”，对民主派初选的参与者和组织者进行拘捕和起诉。
description.en: The Hong Kong police arrested and prosecuted participants and organizers of the pro-democracy primaries under the 'subversion' offense in the Hong Kong National Security Law.

relationships.source: 香港警务处国家安全处
relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 香港警务处国家安全处策划并执行了针对民主派初选参与者的拘捕行动。
description.en: The National Security Department of the Hong Kong Police Force planned and executed the arrest operation targeting participants of the pro-democracy primaries.

relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 律政司以“串谋颠覆国家政权”罪名正式起诉47名民主派人士。
description.en: The Department of Justice formally prosecuted 47 pro-democracy figures on charges of 'conspiracy to commit subversion'.

relationships.target: 2020年香港立法会选举民主派初选

description.zh-cn: 戴耀廷是民主派初选的主要倡议者和组织者之一。
description.en: Benny Tai was one of the main proponents and organizers of the pro-democracy primaries.

relationships.target: 揽炒十步曲

description.zh-cn: 戴耀廷于2020年4月28日在《苹果日报》发表文章，提出“揽炒十步曲”方针。
description.en: On April 28, 2020, Benny Tai published an article in Apple Daily proposing the 'Ten steps to mutual destruction' strategy.

relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 区诺轩在案件审讯中担任控方证人。
description.en: Au Nok-hin served as a prosecution witness during the case trial.

relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 赵家贤在案件审讯中担任控方证人。
description.en: Andrew Chiu served as a prosecution witness during the case trial.

relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 钟锦麟在案件审讯中担任控方证人。
description.en: Chung Kam-lun served as a prosecution witness during the case trial.

relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 林景楠在案件审讯中担任控方证人。
description.en: Mike Lam served as a prosecution witness during the case trial.

relationships.source: 香港民主派初选大搜捕
relationships.target: 戴耀廷

description.zh-cn: 戴耀廷在香港47人案中被拘捕、起诉，并最终被判处10年监禁。
description.en: Benny Tai was arrested, prosecuted, and ultimately sentenced to 10 years in prison in the Hong Kong 47 case.

relationships.source: 香港民主派初选大搜捕
relationships.target: 刘伟聪

description.zh-cn: 刘伟聪在香港47人案中被拘捕、起诉，但经审讯后被裁定罪名不成立。
description.en: Lawrence Lau was arrested and prosecuted in the Hong Kong 47 case, but was acquitted after trial.

relationships.source: 香港民主派初选大搜捕
relationships.target: 李予信

description.zh-cn: 李予信在香港47人案中被拘捕、起诉，但经审讯后被裁定罪名不成立。律政司未对其裁决提出上诉，案件正式结束。
description.en: Lee Yue-shun was arrested and prosecuted in the Hong Kong 47 case, but was acquitted after trial. The Department of Justice did not appeal his acquittal, formally concluding the case.

relationships.source: 香港民主派初选大搜捕
relationships.target: 何桂蓝

description.zh-cn: 何桂蓝在香港47人案中被拘捕、起诉，并最终被判处7年监禁。
description.en: Gwyneth Ho was arrested, prosecuted, and ultimately sentenced to 7 years in prison in the Hong Kong 47 case.

relationships.target: 公民党 (香港)

description.zh-cn: 杨岳桥在审讯期间宣布退出公民党。
description.en: Alvin Yeung announced his withdrawal from the Civic Party during the trial.

relationships.target: 公民党 (香港)

description.zh-cn: 谭文豪在审讯期间宣布退出公民党。
description.en: Jeremy Tam announced his withdrawal from the Civic Party during the trial.

relationships.target: 公民党 (香港)

description.zh-cn: 郭家麒在审讯期间宣布退出公民党。
description.en: Kwok Ka-ki announced his withdrawal from the Civic Party during the trial.

relationships.target: 公民党 (香港)

description.zh-cn: 李予信在审讯期间宣布退出公民党。
description.en: Lee Yue-shun announced his withdrawal from the Civic Party during the trial.

relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 时任保安局局长李家超形容初选是“歹毒的计划”，并表示警方的拘捕行动是必要和必需的，以维护国家安全。
description.en: Then-Secretary for Security John Lee described the primaries as a 'vicious plot' and stated that the police's arrest operation was necessary and essential to safeguard national security.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部
relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 中国外交部表示支持香港警方依法履职，并反对外部势力干涉。
description.en: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of China expressed support for the Hong Kong police in performing their duties according to the law and opposed interference by external forces.

relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 时任美国国务卿蓬佩奥对拘捕行动表示愤慨，并考虑对相关人员实施制裁。
description.en: Then-U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo expressed outrage at the arrests and stated that the U.S. was considering sanctions against those involved.

relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 时任英国外交大臣蓝韬文谴责该拘捕行动是对香港人权和自由的沉重打击。
description.en: Then-UK Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab condemned the arrest operation as a grievous blow to the rights and freedoms of the people of Hong Kong.

relationships.target: 香港民主派初选大搜捕

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国总统蔡英文谴责大搜捕，并呼吁全世界民主阵营伙伴声援香港。
description.en: Then-President of the Republic of China Tsai Ing-wen condemned the mass arrests and called on democratic partners worldwide to support Hong Kong.
